text: Guyana competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics in Seoul, South Korea. A total of eight athletes, seven men and one woman, competed for the nation in three sports. ==Athletics== ==Boxing== ==Cycling== Two male cyclists represented Guyana in 1988. ;Men's road race * Byron James ;Men's sprint * Colin Abrams ==References== ==External links== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1988 Summer Olympics 1988 Olympics
title: Guyana at the 1988 Summer Olympics
